mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ai_model (model_name, model_code, model_desc, is_default, status, max_token, prompt) values (#{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{maxToken,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prompt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ai_model set model_name = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_code = #{modelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_desc = #{modelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, max_token = #{maxToken,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prompt = #{prompt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, model_name, model_code, model_desc, is_default, status, max_token, prompt from ai_model
